scenario_text.value: You...! You’re still hanging around here?!

Perfect timing! We were just trying to sniff
out you morons.
Sniff out...? For what?!
The Magatama.
Huh?!

Heh... Your face says it all. You have it,
don’t you?
I, I have no clue what you’re talking about!

It’s no use trying to play dumb! You can’t
fool us!

We know that Magatama is needed to open the
door into the shrine...
We even know you guys have it!

So you’ve figured out that much... In that
case...
No... We’ll have to fight again at this rate.

They weren’t willing to hear us out before.
I doubt this time’ll be any different.
Okay, then... I’ll give it a shot.
Minoru? Are you sure?

If we can get away without a fight, we should
at least try, right?
I’ll see what I can do. Just watch me.
Sure, okay.

Sup, party people! Whaddaya say enough’s
enough with the fisticuffs?

Ain’t nothing for y’all to gain from fighting
at this point, now is there?
What did you say?!

I mean, we’ll fight, you’ll lose, we’ll take
the Magatama. Sucks to be you, right?

So if you just cut to the chase, and hand
over the stone, we’ll—

How DARE you! This disrespect is completely
unforgivable!
Yow! What the heck, he’s super pissed!
With such incitement, what did you expect?!
Looks like the plan was a bust.
Takuma, they’re itching for a fight!

Talking was pointless from the start! What’s
the plan?!

Fine, then... If we have another battle on
our hands here, so be it!
